profile.name: Muhammad Saad
profile.title: Post Secondary Graduate
profile.bio: Muhammad Saad is a game and software developer currently completing an Advanced Diploma in Game Programming at Centennial College. He has hands-on experience with JSON, Python, and JavaScript through coursework in web development and networking. With a background in community leadership and event coordination, he brings strong communication and problem-solving skills to every project.

hero.description: Specializing in Python, JSON, and Unity.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am game and software developer and have completed an Advanced Diploma in Game Programming at Centennial College. I have has hands-on experience with JSON, Python, and JavaScript through coursework in web development and networking. With a background in community leadership and event coordination, he brings strong communication and problem-solving skills to every project.
about.passion: I'm passionate about creating high-performance web applications with a focus on security, scalability, and exceptional user experience. My approach combines technical expertise with a deep understanding of business requirements.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description: My professional journey in software development across various roles and organizations.

achievements: Planned, organized, and facilitated engaging events, lesson plans, and activities for participants, creating impactful experiences. Led weekly community events for 40+ youth, authored activity guides and safety checklists, reducing setup time by 30%

Supervised 40+ program participants during summer sessions, leading over 20 structured lesson plans focused on personal development, teamwork, and creativity. Ensured a safe and inclusive environment, resulting in increased engagement and positive feedback from both participants and parents.
Provided oversight for daily activities, ensuring smooth progress and successful completion of daily lesson plans.
Developed and presented meeting content for a variety of audiences, including informational sessions, to communicate program updates, share resources, and encourage community engagement..

Developed and implemented community engagement initiatives to advance the social and economic development goals of the project, including two summer festivals that showcased local tenant artistic talents and a scholarship dinner that recognized thirty Limitless Heights Scholarship recipients..
Managed documentation with Google Sheets, including contact lists and sign-in forms.
Designed engaging marketing materials using Canva—including bios, menus, flyers, QR codes, and business cards—to promote community events and drive participation effectively.

list.title: Python application
list.description: I built a simple web app where users click on animal photos tolearn about them—things like where they live, the challenges theyface, and how we can help.
